analysis.key_quote: One of the major strengths of the civil service is its apolitical nature of thousands of hard working civil servants who do the incredibly important work of the carrying out the government's actual work regardless of who is in office.
analysis.rationale: The comment strongly opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of the apolitical nature of civil service and the protections that ensure it remains nonpartisan, which aligns with concerns about politicization.
